<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby SEO Business Starter
</h1>
<p>
Gatsby SEO Business Starter - This is for businesses (with postal address). Just put your info in siteMetadata.
</p>

## ğŸš€ Quick start

1.  **Create a Gatsby site.**

    ```shell
    gatsby new new-site https://github.com/kate-mills/gatsby-seo-business-starter
    ```

    ```shell
    cd new-site/
    gatsby develop
    ```


### ğŸ§  New Github repo

1.  Go: https://github.com/kate-mills?tab=repositories

2.  Create: New repo

3. Local

    ```shell
    git ls-remote # nothing 
    git remote add origin <New Repo> 
    git ls-remote # New Repo
    git push origin master

    ```


### ğŸ§ Start Editing siteMetadata in ./gatsby-config.js

1.  **organization.geo** - https://www.latlong.net/convert-address-to-lat-long.html, or right click google maps

1.  **organization.logo** -must be 112x112px, at minimum

### ğŸ§ Start Editing siteMetadata in ./src/constants

1.  links.js

1.  social-icons.js

### ğŸ§ Start Editing siteMetadata in ./src/components/Complete/SEO/SchemaOrg.js

1.  **Edit hardcoded** OpeningHoursSpecification
